Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review notes from last week's meetings and prepare for character design refinement.
Start refining character designs (first pass). Focus on main protagonist and key NPCs, ensuring alignment with narrative and gameplay needs.
Take a short break, browse art inspiration websites for fresh ideas.
Continue refining character designs, focusing on details like clothing, accessories, and facial expressions.
Review progress on character designs. Make adjustments based on personal critique.
Email @ldes-1 and @ndes-1 to confirm character design alignment with narrative and gameplay vision.

Browse concept art portfolios for inspiration, relax before wrapping up.
